headline: Warren Buffett Remains Optimistic About America. Here Are Top American Companies Worth Investing In.
summary: Warren Buffett has guided Berkshire Hathaway through U.S. stock market investing for 59 years.  Buffett’s investing has spanned all market environments.  The top investor continues to believe in the future of American companies -- and their stock performance.
